title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki

arkub left at 13:36 (Read error: 113 (No route to host)  
xwiki-bridge - (14:19): [ankitwipl] i am looking for java client library  
xwiki-bridge - (14:21): [flavius.olaru] one little question. what is the code macro for velocity in xwiki syntax 1.0?  
arkub joined #xwiki at 14:24  
xwiki-bridge - (14:25): [glerouge] flavius.olaru : WDYM?  
xwiki-bridge - (14:25): [glerouge] in xwiki syntax 1.0 you simply put velocity in the page  
xwiki-bridge - (14:26): [glerouge] if you put $doc it will return the document name right away for instance  
xwiki-bridge - (14:26): [flavius.olaru] i want to display the result from $doc.display("property", "edit") in a xwiki document with xwiki/1.0  
xwiki-bridge - (14:27): [flavius.olaru] i don't want it parsed on rendering  
xwiki-bridge - (14:27): [glerouge] just put $doc.display("property", "edit") in the page and save it  
xwiki-bridge - (14:27): [flavius.olaru] yes and it parses the results and then it renders the html  
xwiki-bridge - (14:27): [flavius.olaru] i'm missing the behind the scene part  
xwiki-bridge - (14:28): [glerouge] there might be documentation about this on platfrom.xwiki.org somewhere  
xwiki-bridge - (14:28): [flavius.olaru] the velocity code returned by $doc.display  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (14:29): $doc.display returns a String, $doc is just what velocity knows com.xpn.xwiki.api.Document as  
venkatesh left at 14:30 (Ping timeout: 180 seconds  
venkatesh joined #xwiki at 14:31  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (14:33): Here is a javadoc for Document, all of these methods are available to you from velocity using $doc   http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/DevGuide/API/xwiki%2Dcore%2D2.0.5%2Djavadoc.jar/com/xpn/xwiki/api/Document.html  
xwiki-bridge - (14:35): [sdumitriu] flavius.olaru: What is parsed?  
xwiki-bridge - (14:35): [sdumitriu] You can use {pre}$doc.display... {/pre}  
xwiki-bridge - (14:43): [Jérôme Velociter] is it me or their is a display issue with icons on the top bar when not logged in  
xwiki-bridge - (14:48): [Jérôme Velociter] (on trunk)  
venkatesh left at 15:28 (Ping timeout: 180 seconds

xwiki-bridge - (15:46): [flavius.olaru] thanks sergiu: i've figured it out how it works
